column5: Does one need to vent a battery box? I made one up tonight with the charger as part  of the box, mounted on the outside, but I am wondering if I need to drill vent holes into it as well. Oh BTW, do not misplace the wingnut that come with the batteries!
Yes... and it's highly recommended to replace the wing nuts with stainless nuts and use a wrench. As matter of fact Mercury mandates it...
Thanks for the advice, I will do that and as well, coat the connections with No-lux. (a paste used to preserve residential alum. wiring)
